front.title: The use cases of yang model conversion

author.organization: Beijing Univ. of Posts and Telecom.
Beijing Univ. of Posts and Telecom.
Beijing Univ. of Posts and Telecom.

abstract.t: This document contains the brief description and the guidelines for the usage of Yang model conversion (YMC). It demonstrates the benefits of YMC for both communication vendors and network operators, provides several use cases to show the proper operations, and provides the recommendations for the development.
